about.title: About Shield of Athena
about.heroSubtitle: For over 15 years, we've been a lifeline for women and children escaping family violence in Montreal's diverse communities.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: The Shield of Athena is a non-profit organization dedicated to supporting victims of family violence. We offer emergency shelter and professional services to women and their children, with culturally and linguistically adapted support to serve Montreal's major ethnocultural communities.
mission.description2: We believe that every woman and child deserves to live free from violence, with access to safety, dignity, and the resources needed to rebuild their lives.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A society where all women and children live free from violence, supported by communities that recognize, prevent, and respond effectively to family violence across all cultural backgrounds.

professional.title: Professional Services
professional.description: Our offices in Laval and Montr√©al offer multilingual services by professional social workers, trained cultural intermediaries, and supervised law students.

shelter.title: Athena's House
shelter.description: Our emergency shelter provides safe housing to women and their children 24/7, offering a secure and empowering environment when they need it most.

outreach.title: Community Outreach
outreach.description: Across Montreal and Laval, our community outreach program provides vital information to men and women in their own languages and cultural contexts.

culturalSensitivity.title: Cultural Sensitivity
culturalSensitivity.description: We recognize that each woman's experience of violence is shaped by her cultural background. Our services are specifically adapted to meet the needs of Montreal's diverse ethnocultural communities.

multilingualSupport.title: Multilingual Support
multilingualSupport.description: We provide services in multiple languages including English, French, Arabic, Spanish, Armenian, Greek, Russian, Persian, Urdu, and Bengali to ensure no woman is turned away due to language barriers.

empowerment.title: Empowerment
empowerment.description: We believe in empowering women to make their own choices and rebuild their lives with dignity. Our approach focuses on supporting women's strength and resilience throughout their healing journey.

comprehensiveCare.title: Comprehensive Care
comprehensiveCare.description: From emergency shelter and legal guidance to therapy and community support, we provide holistic services that address the complex needs of survivors and their children.

cta.title: Join Us in Making a Difference
cta.description: Every donation helps us provide safety, support, and hope to women and children when they need it most.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.heroSubtitle: We're here to help. Reach out for support, information, or to get involved.
contact.confidentialNotice: All communications are confidential and secure.

getInTouch.title: Get In Touch
getInTouch.description: Shield of Athena provides multilingual support services to victims of domestic violence. Contact us for confidential assistance, information about our programs, or to learn how you can help.

languages.title: Languages We Speak
languages.description: Our multilingual staff provides services in the following languages:

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible. All information is kept strictly confidential.
form.messagePlaceholder: Please describe how we can help you...
form.privacy: I understand that all information provided will be kept confidential and used only to respond to my inquiry.
form.requiredFields: * Required fields | Response time: 24-48 hours during business days

visitOffices.title: Visit Our Offices
visitOffices.description: Walk-ins welcome during business hours. No appointment necessary for crisis support.

supportLines.title: 24/7 Support Lines
supportLines.description: Crisis support available around the clock through our partner organizations.

events.title: Community Events
events.description: Meet our team at community outreach events and information sessions.
events.note: Check our calendar for upcoming events

finalCta.title: Ready to Get Help or Get Involved?
finalCta.description: Don't wait. Reach out today for confidential support or to learn how you can make a difference.

resources.title: Are You a Victim?
resources.heroSubtitle: Get immediate help and support. You are not alone.
resources.legalNotice: Domestic violence is a crime in Canada. You have the right to live violence-free.

emergency.title: üö® Is it an emergency situation?
emergency.description: If you're in immediate danger or someone is threatening you right now.
emergency.policeNote: Police are equipped to deal with violent situations and will not blame you.

shelter.description: Safe housing for you and your children, available up to two months.

children.title: üë∂ Are your children suffering?
children.description: Specialized programs and activities to help children affected by family violence.
children.servicesList: Safe childcare ‚Ä¢ Educational activities ‚Ä¢ Trauma counseling ‚Ä¢ Age-appropriate support

safety.title: Safety Planning Guide
safety.description: Having a protection plan can help you react quickly and safely in dangerous situations.

afterLeaving.title: If you are no longer with your partner

steps.0: Notify neighbors and landlord that your partner no longer lives with you
steps.4: Meet ex-partner only in public places
steps.5: Arrange neutral locations for child visits
steps.6: Inform school/daycare about authorized pickup persons

stillTogether.title: If you are still with your partner

steps.0: Plan where to go in an emergency (friend, relative, shelter)
steps.1: Create a code word with someone you trust
steps.3: Memorize shelter and crisis line numbers
steps.4: Recognize warning signs of escalating violence
steps.6: Prepare and hide a departure kit

departureKit.title: Emergency Departure Kit
departureKit.description: Keep these items in a safe place (friend's house, relative's home, or secure location):

finalMessage.title: You Are Not Alone
finalMessage.description: Professional, multilingual support is available 24/7. Take the first step toward safety.
finalMessage.confidentialNote: All services are confidential and available in multiple languages

emergency.title: IMPORTANT NUMBERS
emergency.multilingualSupport: The Shield's Multilingual Sexual Violence Support and Help Lines
emergency.confidentialNotice: All calls are confidential and free | Multiple languages available

organization.name: Shield of Athena
organization.subtitle: Bouclier d'Ath√©na | Founded 1991
organization.description: A registered non-profit organization providing comprehensive support services to survivors of domestic violence and their children. We offer emergency shelter, professional counseling, legal advocacy, and community resources in a safe, confidential environment.
